metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0490 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Wi-Fi could enable a localmalicious application to delete user data. This issue is rated as Moderatebecause it is a local bypass of user interaction requirements that wouldnormally require either user initiation or user permission. Product:Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33178389.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
